resources.string: Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\".
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.

Google Speech Recognition is required to use MarcoPolo. To install, tap Settings > Offline Speech Recognition > All > Then install the languages you want. Make sure the correct language is selected by tapping the \"Select Language\"
If your phone does not respond between the times xx to xx when you shout xxx, then please check the following:
Too much battery drain? try this ...

The App Responds to Random Sounds?

A loud environment can sometimes accidentally trigger the app to respond. Changing the input phrase to something more complex or adjusting sensitivity can help prevent this.

The lower the number the less false alarms there will be, but the app may respond to the trigger word less often.

The App Is Not Responding?

Some users may not get a response when calling out the trigger word, please try waiting 4 minutes, and try setting a new TRIGGER WORD from the second menu button at the bottom of the screen.

If there is still no response then switch the recogniser.
Adjust the volume of the text response here. If you want to override "silent" then go to settings.

Marco Polo will only listen in the background during certain times to save battery. Ensure you are calling out during the times itâ€™s listening or change the start and end times to when you\'re most likely to lose your phone.
Enable this to receive a notification when Marco Polo responds to your trigger word.

Is your device on silent often? Not a problem, enable this to temprarily increase the volume when your device hears the trigger word - you\'ll never miss a response, nor will it affect your other notifications.
